stem: After an inversion ankle sprain, a patient has decreased sensation over most of the dorsum of the foot except the web space between the hallux and second toe. Which nerve is most likely injured?
rationale_correct: Superficial fibular nerve supplies most of the dorsum of the foot; the first web space is deep fibular.

rationale_distractors.A: Deep fibular supplies only the first web space.
rationale_distractors.E: Medial plantar supplies plantar surface, not dorsum.
